sample_change_requests.title: Upgrade embedding model from ada-002 to ada-003
sample_change_requests.description: Upgrade OpenAI embedding model to improve accuracy from 78% to 84%. Requires re-embedding all financial documents.
sample_change_requests.technical_impact: 4 hours downtime to re-embed 500,000 documents. Requires vector database migration.
sample_change_requests.compliance_impact: Affects PII processing and financial data handling. New model not yet approved under SOX controls. Requires compliance review and external audit notification.
sample_change_requests.business_impact: Accuracy improvement from 78% to 84%. 50 business units affected. 4-hour maintenance window required.

sample_change_requests.title: SSL certificate renewal for production API
sample_change_requests.description: Renew SSL certificate expiring in 30 days for api.company.com
sample_change_requests.technical_impact: Zero downtime. Automatic certificate rotation via cert-manager.
sample_change_requests.compliance_impact: Maintains security controls. No compliance impact - routine maintenance.
sample_change_requests.business_impact: No user impact. Prevents service disruption from expired certificate.

sample_change_requests.title: Patch zero-day vulnerability in LangChain
sample_change_requests.description: Critical security patch for CVE-2024-XXXXX affecting all RAG systems. Exploit actively used in the wild.
sample_change_requests.technical_impact: 15-minute downtime to restart all RAG services with patched version. No data migration required.
sample_change_requests.compliance_impact: Addresses critical security vulnerability. Failure to patch within 24 hours violates security policy and SOX 404 requirements.
sample_change_requests.business_impact: 15-minute outage affecting 50 business units. Alternative: Data breach affecting 10 million customer records.

sample_change_requests.title: Add new data source: Customer support tickets
sample_change_requests.description: Integrate Zendesk support tickets into RAG knowledge base to improve customer service responses.
sample_change_requests.technical_impact: New data ingestion pipeline. 200,000 tickets to embed (estimated 2 hours). No downtime for existing systems.
sample_change_requests.compliance_impact: Support tickets contain PII (customer names, emails, phone numbers). Requires PII detection and redaction. GDPR Article 25 data minimization applies.
sample_change_requests.business_impact: Improves customer service agent productivity by 20%. No user-facing impact during deployment.

sample_change_requests.title: Migrate RAG system from AWS Mumbai to AWS Frankfurt
sample_change_requests.description: Migrate EU tenant data from AWS Mumbai to AWS Frankfurt for GDPR compliance (data residency requirements).
sample_change_requests.technical_impact: 8-hour migration window. Cross-region data transfer of 5TB. Requires blue-green deployment to maintain uptime.
sample_change_requests.compliance_impact: CRITICAL: GDPR Article 45 requires EU data to be stored in EU. Current Mumbai storage violates GDPR. DPDPA Section 16 requires Indian data to stay in India. Must implement split architecture.
sample_change_requests.business_impact: 8-hour maintenance window for EU tenants. 15% cost increase due to higher Frankfurt pricing. Latency improvement for EU users (50ms reduction).
